org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util

Class Saml10ObjectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util.AbstractSamlObjectBuilder
      • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util.Saml10ObjectBuilder

  • public final class Saml10ObjectBuilder
extends AbstractSamlObjectBuilder
    This is the response builder for Saml1 Protocol.
    Since:
    4.1
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed mmoayyed@unicon.net

      • encodeSamlResponse

        public void encodeSamlResponse(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse,
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest,
                      org.opensaml.saml.saml1.core.Response samlMessage)
                        throws Exception
        Encode response and pass it onto the outbound transport. Uses CasHTTPSOAP11Encoder to handle encoding.
        Parameters:
        httpResponse - the http response
        httpRequest - the http request
        samlMessage - the saml response
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception in case encoding fails.
